# [Interview #74: AOL Chat, Entry #23](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=74#23)

#### Question

Did your purposefully use Neo-Pagan and New Age influences to develop the WOT series?

#### Robert Jordan

Not knowingly no. I don't think so.
